name: The Legend of the Ancient Wizard
name_original: The Legend of the Ancient Wizard
description:
The Legend of the Ancient Wizard is a game about a wizard who gains the control of a hat. It is drawn very roughly, however, it's a modern day masterpiece. It might not have the best graphics. It might not have the best story. But it is sure one splendid first game, one that is worth noting.

A GAME BY VHS DUNGEON'S VERY OWN LOUBOU.
